workingonit: We are working on this feature.
restarting: Error connecting to the Server, the App will restart in a few seconds.
change-privacy-legend:

insight.title: Financial Insight
insight.no-data: There is no data in your Wallet that fit the graph selected.

loadingapp.invalidseed-error: The seed phrase was invalid. Review every single word of the seed.
loadingapp.invalidufvk-error: The Viewing Key was invalid. Review the Key and/or scan it again.
loadingapp.nointernet-message: There is no established internet connection. Please fix this issue.
loadingapp.noopenwallet-message: An error occurred while the App was trying to open the active wallet.
loadingapp.changeserver-basic:
Change the Server and
Open Current Wallet

loadedapp.restoremainnet-error: This option is only available for 'Mainnet' servers.
loadedapp.changeservernew-error: Error trying to change the server to the new one:
loadedapp.readingwallet-error: Error trying to read the wallet with the new server:
loadedapp.changeserverold-error: Error trying to change the server to the old one:
loadedapp.differentchain-error: You are changing to a server with a different chain, you will no longer have access to this wallet without the seed phrase.
loadedapp.syncing: Pausing the Synchronization to be able to Complete the Transaction.
loadedapp.zcash-url: You already have an address in the send screen
loadedapp.connection-error: No Internet connection, Zingo can't work properly this way.
loadedapp.tryingnewserver: Trying to connect to the new Server... Can take a few seconds.
loadedapp.tryingnewserver-error: After 30 seconds the new server doesn't respond.
loadedapp.readingwallet: Reading successfully the wallet with the server:
loadedapp.restorewallet-alert: Confirm that you want to restore a new wallet using your seed phrase.

rpc.parsebirthday-error: Error: Couldn't parse as a number:
rpc.walletstored-message: Stored the wallet because a batch is finished:
rpc.sixtyseconds-message: Stored the wallet every 60 seconds, batch:
rpc.backupnotfound-error: Error: Couldn't find any backup of any wallet.
rpc.deletewallet-error: Error: Couldn't delete the current wallet.

memos.text: Don't download any memos. Server will not learn what transactions belong to you.
Download only my memos. Server will learn what TxIDs belong to you, but can't see the addresses, amounts or memos.
Download all memos in the blockchain. Server will not learn what TxIDs belong to you. This consumes A LOT of bandwidth.

currencies.text: No fetching any price for any currency, only ZEC.
You can fetch the price for US Dollars besides ZEC.

languages.text: All the information will be in English.
All the information will be in Spanish.

sendalls.text: Enable the possibility of sending all the wallet amount with a button.
Disable the sending all button because could be a risk to have it.

privacys.text: High Privacy, all the sensitive information is hidden. Tap to reveal the hidden values.
Normal Privacy, you can see all the information.

modes.text: Basic Mode, the most simple way to use Zingo.
Advanced Mode, for the advanced user.

settings.ismemo: You need to choose the download memos option to save.
settings.isthreshold: You need to choose the transaction filter threshold option to save.
settings.isserver: You need to choose one Server of the list or fill out a valid Server URI.
settings.isuri: You need to fill out a valid Server URI.
settings.title: Settings
settings.islanguage: You need to choose a language to save.
settings.privacy-title: Switch between High or Normal Privacy
settings.mode-title: Switch between Basic or Advanced Mode

info.title: Server Info
info.errorgemini: Error fetching the price from the Internet.
info.errorrpcmodule: Internal Error fetching the price from the Internet

rescan.title: Rescan
rescan.text-1: This will re-fetch all transactions and rebuild your shielded wallet, starting from block height

seed.title: Seed
seed.text-readonly: Before closing this screen, carefully write down this seed phrase. It is the only way you can restore/access your current wallet.
seed.text-readonly-backup: Before restoring the backup of the previous wallet, carefully write down this seed phrase. It is the only way you can restore/access your current wallet.
seed.text-readonly-change: Before accessing another wallet, carefully write down this seed phrase. It is the only way you can restore/access your current wallet.
seed.text-readonly-server: Before changing another server, carefully write down this seed phrase. It is the only way you can restore/access your current wallet.
seed.birthday-no-readonly:
Block height of first transaction. (It's OK, if you don't know)
Value range between
seed.change-warning: If you change to another wallet, you will no longer have access to this wallet without the seed phrase.
seed.backup-warning: If you change to your backup wallet, you will no longer have access to this wallet without the seed phrase.
seed.server-warning: If you change to a server with different chain, you will no longer have access to this wallet without the seed phrase.
seed.mainnet-warning: No backup of this wallet, only available in 'MAINNET'.

send.title: Send
send.somefunds: Some funds still confirming or syncing
send.sendall-message: Your are about to send the entire amount in your wallet
send.duplicate-nullifier-error: Your funds are still confirming and probably syncing. You can wait until the funds are confirmed or you can try to send now with a lower amount. The Transaction build failed!
send.dust-error: The amount that you are trying to send to a Transparent address is really tiny. The Transaction build failed!
send.fetchpricebody: Please confirm that you want to fetch the USD price from the Internet.

receive.unoprivkey: No Unified address to import the Spending Key
receive.unoviewkey: No Unified address to import the Full Viewing Key
receive.title: Receive

history.shield-legend-all: Increase your shielded spendable balance by shielding:
history.shield-legend-transparent: Increase your shielded spendable balance by shielding:
history.shield-legend-sapling: Migrate your funds to newest shielding:
history.shield-alert-all: Confirm to upgrade all your funds to the latest Orchard shielded pool.
history.shield-alert-transparent: Confirm to shield your funds to the latest Orchard shielded pool.
history.shield-alert-sapling: Confirm to upgrade your funds to the latest Orchard shielded pool
history.title: History

import.title: Viewing Key
import.key-label: Enter the Unified Full Viewing key
import.text: Restoring from viewing key requires a rescan, and may take a long time to complete.

ufvk.title: Key
ufvk.text-readonly: Before closing this screen, carefully write down this viewing key. It is the only way you can restore/access your current wallet.
ufvk.text-readonly-backup: Before restoring the backup of the previous wallet, carefully write down this viewing key. It is the only way you can restore/access your current wallet.
ufvk.text-readonly-change: Before accessing another wallet, carefully write down this viewing key. It is the only way you can restore/access your current wallet.
ufvk.text-readonly-server: Before changing another server, carefully write down this viewing key. It is the only way you can restore/access your current wallet.
ufvk.change-warning: If you change to another wallet, you will no longer have access to this wallet without the seed phrase.
ufvk.backup-warning: If you change to your backup wallet, you will no longer have access to this wallet without the seed phrase.
ufvk.server-warning: If you change to a server with different chain, you will no longer have access to this wallet without the seed phrase.
ufvk.mainnet-warning: No backup of this wallet, only available in 'MAINNET'.

uris.notvalid: was not a valid zcash address (Unified, Sapling or Transparent)
uris.notvalidparameter: was not understood as a valid parameter
uris.oneentry: URI Should have at least 1 entry
uris.parseerror: Right now it is not possible to verify the address with the server
